title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the dangers of the drug trade with a former student.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime, facing the chaos unleashed by a criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy disappears, his friends and family uncover a series of extraordinary mysteries involving secret experiments and supernatural forces.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
